description: Agricultural machinery for planting and seeding
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
____________________________

**Solicitation No.**: WS4279226925

**Title**: Custom Plot Seeder

**Public Tender Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Description**: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) requires a custom plot seeder. Proposals will be accepted in accordance with the Canada-wide tendering policy.

**Key Details**
* **Classification**: [Agricultural machinery for planting and seeding]
* **Expected Contract Date**: Anticipated to start on [The date falls within these two dates:] 2024-01-01 and 2024-11-11
* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta
* **Solicitation Document**: Request for Proposals

**Factors and Criteria**
*   **Evaluation**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Has a free agreement with Ukraine

**Activities**
**Notice Date**: The solicitation notice was published on [Public Tender Release Date@ 2023-02-13]

**The Tender**
The tender status is Open as per this solicitation document identified by solicitation number: WS4279226925.

**Data**
*   This tender is subject to [Trade Agreements for Canada].

Note to the Procurement Team, the training information and other supporting documents were too pedantic, so they have been left out for brevity. The word limit is 400. Specifically, it will not be beneficial if our company comes out as dark horse, don't make rash decisions today! Good Luck!
```
